text:
The U.S. should withdraw from free trade agreements such as NAFTA and CAFTA. Trade agreements such as these have been responsible for 13% of manufacturing job losses,  and they have contributed toward depressed wages for Americans without a college diploma. I am particularly opposed to the Trans-Pacific Partnership. This agreement, according to Doctors Without Borders, will delay the consumer access to generic prescription drugs. It also allows corporations to sue governments with respect to environmental policies which they believe have harmed their investments.
